title: Allomancy defense
description: game inspired in the Brandon Sanderon's Mistborn saga. You must gather resources to build your rebellion against the Lord Ruler.  You can gather resources passively by building up your base or faster if you do allomantic incursions above the roofs of Luthadel, where maybe your allies could help you.

title: Therapy Dashboard
description: Responsive web app to manage and track patients and session for a pshycologits. It has a cool calendar with information about next sessions.

title: Party Kanban
description: A kanban with drag and drop

title: RP Mod for ARK Survival Evolved
description: Mod for RP server with more than 150 items, some crafting tables and new mechanics like adding contextual talk to everything in the world.
